title: Requires inmate sexual harassment complaints made against department employees to be investigated by the attorney general
summary: Authorizes Bethel Temple, Inc. to file an application for a real property tax exemption.
actClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 183 of the laws of 2002 authorizing Bethel Temple, Inc. in the city of Mt. Vernon to file an application for a real property tax exemption, in relation to authorizing exemptions
